author: Staff Reporter
text:
Cashier of a cooperative bank was arrested for swindling Rs. 8.15 lakh here on Saturday.

According to police, the cashier, Kannan (31) of Pulluvilai near Nagercoil, had misappropriated money from the People’s Cooperative Bank in Nagercoil.

It was found that he had transferred the money to the tune of Rs. 8.15 lakh illegally to his friend’s account through online and utilised it for his personal purpose a few months ago.

After a departmental inquiry, he was removed from the post. Based on a complaint lodged by the Joint Registrar of Cooperative Societies, Priyadharshini, at the Economic Offences Wing of the district police, Kannan was arrested on Saturday.

Further investigations are on, police sources said.
title: Cooperative bank cashier arrested
